1. Town Council

Town Council

The Town of Prosper is a Home Rule Town with a Mayor and six Council Members who are elected at large for three-year terms.

  1. David F. Bristol

    Mayor

  1. Amy Bartley

    Mayor Pro-Tem, Place 3

  1. Chris Kern

    Deputy Mayor Pro-Tem, Place 4

  1. Marcus E. Ray

  1. Craig Andres

  1. Jeff Hodges

  1. Cameron Reeves

  • 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of every month
  • 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of every month

Watch Town Council Meetings

Prosper Town Council meetings are streamed live online and available to re-watch. Meeting videos are posted no later than 48 hours after a meeting.

The public is invited to address the Town Council on any topic; however, the Council is unable to take action on any topic not listed on the agenda. Please fill out a Public Comment Request Form and submit it to the Town Secretary prior to 4 pm on the day of the meeting.
